tool_description: Poem-Rap Wiz API harnesses AI to create custom poems and raps from user-provided details. Input a name, relevant info, and choose between a poem or rap for a unique, AI-generated piece, perfect for special occasions, personalized messages, or discovering AI-powered creative writing.
name: Poem-Rap Wizard
title: Poem-Rap Wizard

api_list.name: /generate_poem_rap
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poem-rap-wizard.p.rapidapi.com/generate_poem_rap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poem-rap-wizard.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://poem-rap-wizard.p.rapidapi.com/generate_poem_rap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poem-rap-wizard.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

text.description: The generated poem or rap text.
